CI/CD e KubernetesÂ¶

O projeto usa GitHub Actions para CI/CD e faz deploy no Kubernetes.

ðŸ“Œ Pipeline de CI/CD Exemplo com GitHub Actions:

name: CI/CD Pipeline

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
    - name: Checkout code
      uses: actions/checkout@v2

    - name: Set up Node.js
      uses: actions/setup-node@v2
      with:
        node-version: '16'

    - name: Install dependencies
      run: npm install

    - name: Build
      run: npm run build

    - name: Deploy to Kubernetes
      run: kubectl apply -f kubernetes/frontend-deployment.yaml

ðŸ“Œ Deploy no Kubernetes Para aplicar os serviÃ§os:

kubectl apply -f kubernetes/

Acesse a aplicaÃ§Ã£o via http://IP_DO_CLUSTER.
